parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set min/max movement borders displayed in HUD gauges. Use -1 to skip some value.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setHUDMovementLevels''' [minSpeed, maxSpeed, minAlt, maxAlt, minDir, maxDir, targetOrPosition]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [minSpeed, maxSpeed, minAlt, maxAlt, minDir, maxDir, position]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> minSpeed: [[Number]] - Units: m/s

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> maxSpeed: [[Number]] - Units: m/s

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> minAlt: [[Number]] - Units: m

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> maxAlt: [[Number]] - Units: m

</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> minDir: [[Number]] - Units: deg

</value></part><part><name>p7</name>=<value> maxDir: [[Number]] - Units: deg

</value></part><part><name>p8</name>=<value> targetOrPosition: [[Object]] or [[Position]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[setHUDMovementLevels]] [20,30,-1,-1,0.23,2.1,[0,0,0]]</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[setHUDMovementLevels]] [20,30,-1,-1,0.23,2.1,player]</code></value></part><part><name/>=<value> EXAMPL2 
</value></part></template>
